name: Roasted Garlic & Parmesan Hot Dip
description: A crowd-pleasing appy that’s ready in 5 minutes. Perfect for entertaining!

ingredients.name: Roasted Garlic & Parmesan Hot Dip Mix

preparation: In a bowl, combine mix with cream cheese and mayo. Scrape into a heat-safe dish.
Microwave uncovered on medium until heated through, about 3 min. Or, bake in preheated 375° F oven for 15 min, or until warm and bubbly.
tips: Serve with crackers, pita wedges, or bread slices.
